name: s1
description:
You find yourself in a midst of a dark and dense forest. Branches form a thick canopy overhead.
A a narrow footpath winds itself through the trees to the north.

items.name: silver coin
items.description: You notice a small _silver coin_ is glistening on the side of the road.

items.name: old copper coin
items.description: Somebody lost an old _copper coin_ here.

items.name: gold coin
items.description: You catch a sight of a shiny _gold coin_ laying on the ground.

name: s2
description: An oak tree in the forest.
